homeScreenTemplate:
<script>
    var hideInterval = setInterval(function() {
        $("#logo-DevicePage").parents("a").css("display", "none");
      $("#logo-MyProfile55").parents("a").css("display", "none");
       /*   $("#logo-Employee").parents("a").css("display", "none");*/
        if ($("#logo-DevicePage").parents("a").css("display") == "none") {
            clearInterval(hideInterval);
        }
    }, 2000);


/*Sidebar animation start*/

    MyCampusApp.rootScope.animatepage = function(currentstyle) {
        $(".app-body").addClass(currentstyle);
    }

    function getRandomInt(min, max) {
        return Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min + 1)) + min;
    }
    var animstyles = ["slideInDown", "slideInUp", "slideInLeft", "slideInRight", "zoomInUp", "zoomInDown", "zoomInRight", "zoomInLeft", "rotateInDownLeft", "rotateInDownRight", "rotateInUpLeft", "rotateInUpRight", "bounceInDown", "bounceInUp", "bounceInRight", "bounceInLeft", "fadeInDown", "fadeInUp", "fadeInRight", "fadeInLeft", "flipInX", "flipInY", "rollIn"];
    //MyCampusApp.rootScope.animstyles; = animstyles;
    var currentstyle = "";
    var hideInterval = setInterval(function() {
        var animatecss = $("#animatecss");
        if (!animatecss || animatecss.length <= 0) {
            $.ajax({
                url: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/daneden/animate.css/master/animate.css",
                dataType: "text",
                success: function(data) {
                    $("head").append("<style id='animatecss'>" + data + "</style>");
                    clearInterval(hideInterval);
                }
            });
        }
    }, 2000);
    if (!MyCampusApp.rootScope.cangelistadded) {
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.$on("$routeChangeStart", function(event, next, current) {
            //alert(event);
            //alert("route change start");
            for (var i = 0; i < animstyles.length; i++) {
                $(".app-body").removeClass(animstyles[i]);
            }

            //$(".app-body").addClass("animated");
            //$(".app-body").addClass("slideOutUp");

        });
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.$on("$routeChangeSuccess", function(event, next, current) {
            //alert(event);

            currentstyle = animstyles[getRandomInt(0, 22)];
            //alert("route change success " + currentstyle);
            //$(".app-body").addClass(currentstyle);
            //$(".app-body").addClass("animated");
            //$(".app-body").removeClass("slideOutUp");
        });
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.cangelistadded = true;
    }

    try {
        var profiledata = $.jStorage.get("userdetails");
        if (profiledata != null && profiledata != undefined) {
            MyCampusApp.rootScope.userProfileName = profiledata.firstname + " " + profiledata.lastname;
            MyCampusApp.rootScope.useremail = profiledata.email;
            if (profiledata.img == undefined) {
                MyCampusApp.rootScope.userProfilePic = 'images/profileImage.png';
                MyCampusApp.rootScope.showUploadPhoto = true;
            } else {
                MyCampusApp.rootScope.userProfilePic = profiledata.img;
                MyCampusApp.rootScope.showUploadPhoto = false;
            }
            if (profiledata.studentRole == '' || profiledata.studentRole == undefined) {
                MyCampusApp.rootScope.studentRole = "Role";
            } else {
                MyCampusApp.rootScope.studentRole = profiledata.studentRole;
            }
        }else{
            MyCampusApp.rootScope.userProfileName = 'Guest User';
            MyCampusApp.rootScope.userProfilePic = 'images/profileImage.png';
            MyCampusApp.rootScope.studentRole = "Role";
        }
     } catch (e) {
        alert(e)
    }

/*Sidebar animation end*/

</script>

pages.pageprocessor: function pageprocessorApplyNow13(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) {if (window.device) {$.blockUI();}var iabRef = window.open(pagedef.url, "_blank", "location=no,hidden=no,enableViewportScale=yes,clearcache=yes");var hideBlockUi = function() {$.unblockUI();iabRef.show();        };var iabClose = function(data) {$.unblockUI();iabRef.removeEventListener("exit", iabClose);window.location.href = "index.html#home";};iabRef.addEventListener("exit", iabClose);var loadStop = function(data) {hideBlockUi();iabRef.removeEventListener("loadstop", loadStop);};iabRef.addEventListener("loadstop", loadStop);}

pages.datatemplate:
About NSC

Our Campus

Nestled at the foot of Mount Scorpion in Henderson, our 511-acre campus is rapidly developing to meet our growing student population and dynamic programs. Our five buildings house energy-efficient, 40-student or smaller classrooms, and our open community spaces forward sustainable principles with solar panels, xeriscaping, and an organic teaching garden that also serves our campus cafe. BE INSPIRED by our expansive views of the Las Vegas Valley and the world beyond.

Our Leadership

Our engaged executive team hails from all parts of the country and a broad background in higher education and business. Click below to get to know how each leader strives to BE THE DIFFERENCE in the lives of our students, faculty, staff, and community.

Our Culture

Diversity is our greatest strength. When you meet the people on our vibrant campus and learn how each unique, personal perspective and experience contributes to our warm, family-like community, the new ideas you encounter will help you BE A COMPASSIONATE LEADER in an ever-changing global society. To learn more about Nevada State College, please visit our website at www.nsc.edu or contact us to schedule a campus tour. Interested in applying to Nevada State College? Click here to get started.
